body: @Kirby Cosmico this sounds like a tricky and complex situation. I think the fries probably just aren't that good, fast food is never usually as good as you think it will be and fast food advertised as being "hot" actually never really has muck of a kick to it i find. as for Dustin I imagine your pungent odor and greasey hands probably aroused or sexually confused him, which would explain why he was acting weird, what that means for him or you idk but since I don't think your into that sorta thing I'd go to a different taco bell next time or he might confess to you which would be awkward...
